thread.title: The 'Mini-Merkel' vying to succeed Germany's leader

title: The 'Mini-Merkel' vying to succeed Germany's leader
text:
The 'Mini-Merkel' vying to succeed Germany's leader Wednesday, February 28, 2018 - 01:47 
Annegret Kramp-Karrenbauer's election as general-secretary of Germany's ruling party puts her in pole position to succeed Angela Merkel as chancellor after spending most of her career in a tiny state on the French border.   
Annegret Kramp-Karrenbauer's election as general-secretary of Germany's ruling party puts her in pole position to succeed Angela Merkel as chancellor after spending most of her career in a tiny state on the French border.  //reut.rs/2GSXc1l
